description: GraphQL is a query language for APIs, but what are the advantages and how would one implement such in their microservices/APIs. In this session, I will go through the basics of GraphQL, different aspects of GraphQL, and the architecture of such APIs. Most importantly, how 4 different ways we can implement GraphQL for a Springboot microservice/API. Lots of examples, live coding, and helpful comparison on structure, usage, and implementations of GraphQL in Springboot & Java world.
title: GraphQL-ify your APIs
